scenes.text:
NHSF Cardiff Hindu Society believes in providing every member with a unique chance to engage their university experience with Hindu culture in a social, educational & spiritual way, whilst promoting unity amongst the Hindu youths and other cultural/spiritual backgrounds.

We seek to educate our members in Hindu and Indian culture. We are passionate about Sewa, and hope to do lots of charity events. We want to make a positive difference to the Hindu community and an equally positive difference to the local Cardiff community at large.
We meet fortnightly for Aarti. Specific date and times for events can be found on our SU page and our social media.
Our membership is £6.00 for the year!
We have a range of dynamic events and activities, including regional and national sports competitions, Dinners, dances, discussions, debates, Sewa days (charity), and Regular Aarti’s.
